title: Slushies, Slurpees and This College's 44-ounce Soda Cup
itunes:title: Slushies, Slurpees and This College's 44-ounce Soda Cup
description:
Scott Soshnick, Eben Novy-Williams and Michael Barr discuss a number of topics related to the business of sports, including Mississippi State's decision to reduce the prices on a number of its concession items. For instance, a 44 ounce soda is priced at $4, down from $7. A hot dog is $2, down from $5. The trio also discusses Major League Baseball's All-Star game and DraftKings' plan to obtain a New York gambling license through a small casino in Central New York. Also discussed is the new Fanduel Sports book at the Meadowlands, home of Metlife Stadium in New Jersey. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
